basics.name: Noah Kim
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am a junior at the University of Hawaii at Manoa pursuing a double major in Management and Management Info. Systems supplemented by an English minor. I am expected to graduate in Spring 2022.

education.area: Management & Management Information Systems, English minor (expected Spring, 2022)

highlights: Update and maintain sales through the retail POS system
Manage sales and transactions of customer purchases and returns
Fluently conversate in multilingual conversations with customers
Provide exemplary service to customers on the sales floor

work.summary: Server/ waiter for the dining room
highlights: Effectively execute dining room operations such as orders, food service, and dining room maintenance
Demonstrate knowledge of meals and procedures regarding breakfast, lunch, and dinner service
Train newer employees in proper procedures

volunteer.organization: Active Member, Business Executive Society of Tomorrow
highlights: Participate in club events such as company tours, mock interviews, and networking

volunteer.summary: Volunteer technician for audio/ visual aspects of the church
highlights: Organize and take charge of the other volunteers during operation
Maintain proper care and operation of the equipment used for service
Troubleshoot AV issues during service through a master mixer

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Awarded to undergraduates who have achieved a semester grade point average of 3.5 or higher in a 12 credit or more taken for a grade.

awards.title: The Sherwin-Williams Company Aloha Scholarship Fund
awards.summary: Awarded to students planning to/ attending a four-year college majoring in business finance, marketing, or management maintaining a grade point average of 3.0 or more.
